events.title: Border Collie Dogs BBQ
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled BBQ with your furry friends at Alexandria Park. There will be plenty of food, games, and activities for Border Collie owners and enthusiasts.

events.title: Recharge with Some Floofy Cuddles
events.description: Having a RUFF day? Enjoy a relaxing afternoon filled with dog cuddles and meet other dog owners.

events.title: Neutering Cats
events.description: Join us for informative sessions and on-site neutering services by professional veterinarians.

events.title: Ragdoll Party
events.description: Celebrate the charm of Ragdolls at our exclusive Ragdoll Party! There will be activities, grooming tips, and a chance to meet other Ragdoll enthusiasts.

events.title: Puppuccino Day
events.description: Treat your furry friend to a delicious Puppuccino on us! A fun and frothy event where your dog can enjoy a tasty treat alongside fellow dog lovers.

events.title: Vaccinating Your Dog
events.description: Keep your dog healthy and safe with our vaccination day. Professional vets will be available to provide vaccinations and health checks.

events.title: Border Collie Dogs BBQ
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled BBQ with your furry friends at Central Park. There will be plenty of food, games, and activities for Border Collie owners and enthusiasts.
